enWisdom: Chastity is the cornerstone of goodness
Chastity is renunciation [of worldly pleasures]
Chastity is the best (or the root of) magnanimity
Chastity is the best trait
Chastity is the trait of the sagacious
The people of chastity are the most honourable of the honourables

Wisdom: إِنَّ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ يُحِبُّ الْمُتَعَفِّفَ الْحَيِيَّ التَّقِيَّ الرَّاضِيَ
enWisdom: Verily Allah, the Glorified, loves the one who is chaste, modest, pious and satisfied [with His will]
The crown of a man is his chastity and his adornment is his equity
Virtuous chastity is from the traits of the honourable ones
The proof of a man’s sense of honour is his chastity
The purity of beauty is [in] chastity
Counter voraciousness with chastity [and moderation]
Espouse chastity, for indeed it is a good companion

Wisdom: عَلَيْكَ بِالْعَفَافِ فَإِنَّهُ أَفْضَلُ شِيَمِ الْأَشْرَافِ
enWisdom: Espouse chastity, for indeed it is the best trait of the honourable ones

Wisdom: عَلَيْكُمْ بِلُزُومِ الْعِفَّةِ وَالْأَمَانَةِ فَإِنَّهُمَا أَشْرَفُ مَا أَسْرَرْتُمْ وَأَحْسَنُ مَا أَعْلَنْتُمْ وَأَفْضَلُ مَا ادَّخَرْتُمْ
enWisdom: You must espouse chastity and trustworthiness, for verily these two are the most honourable of what you can do in secret and the best of what you can practice openly, and the finest of what you can preserve
To the extent of modesty, there is chastity
Just as you desire, be chaste

Wisdom: لَمْ يَتَحَلَّ بِالْعِفَّةِ مَنِ اشْتَهَى مَا لَا يَجِدُ
enWisdom: One who desires that which he cannot obtain has not adorned himself with chastity

Wisdom: مِنْ كَمَالِ النِّعْمَةِ التَّحَلِّي بِالسَّخَاءِ وَالتَّعَفُّفِ
enWisdom: Being adorned with generosity and chastity is one of the most perfect blessings

Wisdom: لَا تَكْمُلُ الْمَكَارِمُ إِلَّا بِالْعَفَافِ وَالْإِيثَارِ
enWisdom: Noble traits [and deeds] are not complete except with chastity and self-sacrifice

Wisdom: يُسْتَدَلُّ عَلَى عَقْلِ الرَّجُلِ بِالتَّحَلِّي بِالْعِفَّةِ وَالْقَنَاعَةِ
enWisdom: The intellect of a man is indicated by his adorning himself with chastity and contentment

Wisdom: الْعَفَافُ يَصُونُ النَّفْسَ وَيُنَزِّهُهَا عَنِ الدَّنَايَا
enWisdom: Chastity preserves the soul and purifies it from vile demerits
Chastity weakens lust
Through chastity actions become purified
The fruit of chastity is preservation [of oneself from chastisement]
The fruit of chastity is contentment
The cause of contentment is chastity

Wisdom: مَنْ عَفَّ خَفَّ وِزْرُهُ وَعَظُمَ عِنْدَ اللَّهِ قَدْرُهُ
enWisdom: Whoever is chaste, his burden [of sin] is reduced and his status becomes great in the sight of Allah

Wisdom: مَنْ أُتْحِفَ [التجف‏] الْعِفَّةَ وَالْقَنَاعَةَ حَالَفَهُ الْعِزُّ
enWisdom: Whoever is granted chastity and contentment, honour becomes his ally
One whose flanks are chaste, his attributes become good
A chaste person does not commit adultery
There is no indigence with chastity
